import { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { listProductDetails } from "../actions/productActions"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; const ProductScreen = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails); const { loading, error , product } = productDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(id)) },[id,dispatch]); return (
Go Back

{product.name}

Price : Rs.{product.price} Description : {product.description} Price: Rs.{product.price} Status: {product.countInStock>0?'In Stock':'Out of Stock'}
); } export default ProductScreen;
